title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV25-191)
description: On April 7, 2025, ABB published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: ABB M2M Gateway ARM600  firmware versions 4.1.2 to 5.0.3
ABB M2M Gateway SW  versions 5.0.1 to 5.0.3
Arctic Wireless Gateways ARG600, ARC600, ARR600 with Telit PLS62-W wireless modem module
Arctic ARG600, ARC600, ARR600, ARP600  firmware versions 3.4.10, 3.4.11, 3.4.12 and 3.4.13
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
